author: wn.com
title: Arkansas Union Conducting Earthquake Drill on Oct. 15 (University of Arkansas)
text: ( Source : University of Arkansas ) The Arkansas Union will hold its first ever Shake-Out drill at 10:15 a.m. Thursday, Oct. 15, in the Union . A Shake-Out drill is an exercise in which building occupants will be asked to pause momentarily, and
